AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency involved in checkpoint stops and discovering undocumented aliens, with agents allowed to extend stops based on individualized suspicion or probable cause. Testified about how aliens or their families commonly pay smugglers indirectly.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Government: prevailing party at the suppression hearing, with the right to request consent for extending checkpoint stop duration or to proceed based on probable cause.
